name: Kathmandu City Tour
description: We have the chance to visit around Kathmandu Valley and indulge into the culture of Newars, Indigenous community of Kathmandu Valley. Kathmandu Valley is a world heritage site. You can learn about the history, cultures and traditions, festivals etc of Kathmandu Valley. You can also have the sunrise view as well as the panoramic view of Himalayan ranges from Nagarkot. You can enjoy with the nature in Shivapuri National Park.
